summary: The history of American film criticism.
cast: Roger Ebert|Andrew Sarris|Pauline Kael|Jami Bernard|Ernest Borgnine|Kevin Carragee|Jason Carter|Patricia Clarkson|Richard Corliss|David D'Arcy|Otis Ferguson|Owen Gleiberman|Molly Haskell|J. Ruby Rich|Kim Romano|Jonathan Rosenbaum|Richard Schickel|Lisa Schwarzbaum|A.O. Scott|David Sterritt|Michael Szymanski|Mike Szymanski|Kenneth Turan|Scott Weinberg|Lewis D. Wheeler|Michael Wilmington
title: For the Love of Movies: The Story of American Film Criticism
